Description:
Exception is thrown out when open web browser in an old workspace

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070619-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. In an old workspace, open the web browser.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Improve the fixing of bug 191802, avoid out of index error for the content type array.
